import { Component } from 'react' import { Grid, Segment, Button, Loader, Dimmer, Form, Input, Icon, Responsive, Header, Step, Label, Radio, Accordion, Table, Item, Image} from 'semantic-ui-react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { bindActionCreators } from 'redux' import { showEditUser } from '../../actions/checkout' import 'react-credit-cards/es/styles-compiled.css' function sleep(ms) { return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms)); } class User extends Component { constructor() { super() } handleClickOnEdit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('handleClickOnEdit') showEditUser() } handleClickOnEditUser2 = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ user: { buttonLoading: true, status: 'editing' }}) await sleep(2000); this.setState({ user: { status: 'ok', buttonLoading: false }}) } render(){ const disabled = this.props.userSegment.view == 'disabled' ? true : false return ( <> {(['enabled', 'disabled'].includes(this.props.userSegment.view)) && ( {this.props.userSegment.loading && ( Loading )}

)} ) } } function mapStateToProps (store) { const { checkoutState } = store const { userSegment } = checkoutState return { userSegment } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => bindActionCreators({ showEditUser }, dispatch) export default connect( mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps )(User)
